AI Description: The r-txdb-hsapiens-ucsc-hg19-knowngene is a dataset for R that contains known gene annotation information for the human genome assembly GRCh37/hg19. It includes details such as gene names, gene IDs, chromosome locations, exon positions, and transcript IDs.
Core Features: Comprehensive Gene Annotation Information, Highly Detailed Data On Gene Names, Locations, Exons, & Transcripts, Designed For Use With R Programming Language
General Tags: Genomics, Bioinformatics, Data Analysis, R Package
